moves.name: Fell Stinger
moves.description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises sharply.

moves.name: Destiny Bond
moves.description: When this move is used, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints.

moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.description: A sweet scent that lowers the opposing team's evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

moves.name: Gust
moves.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Poison Sting
moves.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: Fury Cutter
moves.description: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. Its power increases if it hits in succession.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

moves.name: Defend Order
moves.description: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Power Gem
moves.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

moves.name: Heal Order
moves.description: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Captivate
moves.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target is charmed into harshly lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Attack Order
moves.description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, it also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Destiny Bond
moves.description: When this move is used, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints.

moves.name: Fell Stinger
moves.description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises sharply.
